title: Re-Divining Self
description: Re-Divining Self is a collection of original poetry, spoken word, short stories, and personal essays that explores stages of personal growth and modern realities through spirituality, honesty, and captivating lyricism. Asante traverses a wide range of genres from lyric poetry to science fiction. Her work evokes thought and lays the groundwork for change upon the premise that true change, begins with reflection, begins with self.
author: Nikala Asante
